Class Or

  • java.lang.Object
    • Formula
      • Or

  • public class Or
extends Formula
    Implements the disjunction of two or more Formulas

      • evaluate

        public boolean evaluate(KripkeModel model,
                        int state)
        Evaluate a disjunction in a state using the given model
        Specified by:
        evaluate in class Formula
        Parameters:
        model - The model used for evaluation
        state - The state to evaluate the disjunction in
        Returns:
        `true` if the disjunction holds in state `state`, `false` otherwise

      • memoize

        public Formula memoize()
        Description copied from class: Formula
        Make a formula remember its evaluation in a specific state. Do not use if you work with different models
        Overrides:
        memoize in class Formula
        Returns:
        The memoized version of the formula

      • simplify

        public Formula simplify()
        Simplify this formula by checking if it is a disjunction of Common/General/Implicit knowledge for a group of agents
        Overrides:
        simplify in class Formula
        Returns:
        `this` or a MultiCommon/MultiEvery/MultiImplicit
        See Also:
